title: My most valued time wasted with this movie
review: It gets the top 10 worst movies that i watched in 2019

title: the whole movie ruined for one important reason!
review: Which bleep bleep bleep's idea was it for the background music to almost drown out the dialogue? Seriously, a decent movie with a decent average plot was completely ruined because of the sound mixing! Mr. Bagdasarian, as a fellow Armenian compatriate I suggest you go to Mr. Atom Egoyan and learn a thing or two about movie making. It's not all just lights, camera and action, and cut all the time!!!!

title: No comment is the best comment
review: How don't you want to learn how to make a movie. It does not need to talk about the main elements of this film because in any points of view it was ruined.
